```{r}
# Our first table came from wikipedia, which is an allowed source
is_valid_robotstxt("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2025_United_States_wildfires")

#reading the html of the website
wildfires2025 <- read_html("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2025_United_States_wildfires")

fires2025 <- html_table(wildfires2025, header = TRUE, fill = TRUE)[[4]]
```


```{r}
fire_states <- fires2025 |>
  distinct(State)
